document.full_text: bulldozers razed a storied mansion where f. scott fitzgerald partied and which some say inspired his novel 'the great gatsby,' leaving just a few chimneys standing on long island's gold coast on monday.
document.title: mansion that may have inspired the great gatsby torn down
lines_and_colors: bulldozers razed a storied mansion where f. scott fitzgerald partied and which some say inspired his novel 'the great gatsby,' leaving just a few chimneys standing on long island's gold coast on monday.
